value.title: Google to examine the departure of a leading AI ethics researcher
value.excerpt: Google says it will examine the departure of a prominent Black female researcher in the field of ethics in artificial intelligence, whose recent, sudden exit has angered thousands of the company's employees and others in the tech and academic communities.

value.title: National Digest: GM green lights test of driverless cars as taxis
value.excerpt: The move, announced Wednesday by GM-owned Cruise, comes two months after the company received California’s permission to have fully driverless cars in the state.

value.title: Google CEO says company will review AI scholar’s abrupt exit
value.excerpt: Google CEO Sundar Pichai has apologized for how a prominent artificial intelligence researcher’s abrupt departure last week has “seeded doubts” in the company. Pichai told Google employees

value.title: Columbia researchers find white men are the worst at reducing AI bias
value.excerpt: Columbia researchers find evidence that differences in gender among engineers plays a role in introducing bias into AI algorithms.

value.title: AI is not yet perfect, but it's on the rise and getting better with computer vision
value.excerpt: It can beat anyone at chess but can't recognize fountains. One professor talks about the promise of AI and computer vision.

value.title: Why IBM’s AI Fact Sheets should be the industry standard
value.excerpt: Every once in awhile an idea comes along that’s so good it makes you wonder why it took so long for someone to think of it. IBM’s AI Fact Sheets is one of those ideas. AI Fact Sheets are a lot like packaged food nutrition labels.

value.title: IBM creates knowledgeable NLP system and adds AI governance capabilities to Watson
value.excerpt: IBM has unveiled a slew of announcements designed to help businesses scale their use of AI. The company also announced the rollout of new capabilities for its Watson platform. IBM researchers have built a hybrid question-answering system called Neuro-Symbolic-QA (NSQA) that for the first time uses neurosymbolic AI to allow an AI system to offer "and"/ "or" to its recommendations.

value.title: Siebel-Led C3.ai More Than Doubles After $651 Million IPO
value.excerpt: C3.ai Inc., the software maker founded by former Oracle Corp. executive Tom Siebel, rose as much as 174% in its trading debut after raising $651 million in its initial public offering above the marketed range.

value.title: General Motors' Cruise Just Took the Humans Out of Its Self-Driving Taxis
value.excerpt: The CEO of Cruise, the San-Francisco-based self-driving company controlled by General Motors , said that it has begun operating autonomous vehicles on San Francisco's streets with

value.title: DoorDash, C3.ai skyrocket in public market debuts
value.excerpt: Haters gonna hate, IPOs gonna pop. That’s the story today as richly valued DoorDash and C3.ai, two American technology unicorns, saw their values skyrocket after they began trading today. DoorDash shares are up just under 83% to $186.

value.title: 7 in-demand tech skills to master in 2021
value.excerpt: IT pros who have worked with natural language processing, automation, and machine learning operations will have the most job opportunities in the new year.

value.title: Microsoft doubles its money after backing C3.ai as it goes public
value.excerpt: The two companies announced a partnership in 2018 to promote C3's software running on Microsoft's public cloud.

value.title: The Apple Car Is Now Officially an Artificial Intelligence Project

value.excerpt: SAN RAMON, Calif. (AP) — General Motors’ self-driving car company is sending vehicles without anybody behind the wheel in San Francisco as it navigates its way toward launching a robotic

value.title: Amazon Forecast Weather Index – automatically include local weather to increase your forecasting model accuracy
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce the Amazon Forecast Weather Index, which can increase your forecasting accuracy by automatically including local weather information in your demand forecasts with one click and at no extra cost. Weather conditions influence consumer demand patterns, product merchandizing decisions,

value.title: Here’s How You’ll Get Paid To Ride In A Self-Driving Car
value.excerpt: There are some intriguing (and surprising) ways that people will get paid to go riding in self-driving cars, and here are the Top 5 most likely means.

value.title: Amazon unveils dozens of machine learning tools
value.excerpt: Invent, the company announced new capabilities for Amazon SageMaker, the general availability of Amazon Neptune ML, and more.

value.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Makes Azure Digital Twins Generally Available
value.excerpt: Azure Digital Twins modeling platform is in general release and is being integrated with an offering from Johnson Controls (JCI).

value.title: DataRobot raises $50 million more to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
value.excerpt: DataRobot has extended its series F round to $320 million through partnerships with Snowflake, Salesforce, and Hewlett Packard Enterprise.

value.title: Arthur.ai snags $15M Series A to grow machine learning monitoring tool
value.excerpt: At a time when more companies are building machine learning models, Arthur.ai wants to help by ensuring the model accuracy doesn’t begin slipping over time, thereby losing its ability to precisely measure what it was supposed to.

value.title: Healthcare Artificial Intelligence (AI) Market To Gain A 51.9% CAGR By 2023
value.excerpt: Healthcare Artificial Intelligence (AI) Market – Overview The surge in AI-based products engaging in data capturing capability is seeing a large number of users in the current pandemic, which will benefit the artificial intelligence systems market.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Just Revealed a Potential Concern for COVID Vaccine Makers
value.excerpt: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are solving problems that we never thought possible. Just this week, a unit of Alphabet -owned Google -- DeepMind -- used the approach to solve a mystery about how proteins fold that had vexed scientists for 50 years.

value.title: Adobe launches AI tools to track omnichannel, spot anomalies quicker
value.excerpt: The goal of the AI tools is to combine data from repositories as wide ranging as point-of-sale to website and apps to call center and loyalty programs.

value.title: IonQ’s roadmap: Quantum machine learning by 2023, broad quantum advantage by 2025
value.excerpt: IonQ's roadmap for trapped ion quantum computers: rack-mounted modular quantum computers by 2023 and broad quantum advantage by 2025.
